Card Text: If you're here, there's been an error.
Left hover text: Close the game and bugfix genius

Card Text: You go to the address the Mustached Cat sends to you. It's an inconspicuous building in an inconspucuous part of town.
Nothing out of the ordinary. Not even when you walk inside to find a bland office lobby.
The only thing not bland is the woman with paperclip earrings and a clipboard waiting in said lobby.
There you are. Bossman's new Chosen One. Let's hope you last longer than the last one.
Left hover text: What happened to the last one?
Right hover text: How long did the last one last?

Card Text: They didn't know how to balance the scales right.
They went too easy on the cult. Didn't make quota. Bossman got angry.
In other words, don't be mediocre, and everything will work out fine.
They went too hard on the cult. Made every single quota but when your workers are unhappy, they revolt.
Don't let dreams of greatness blind you from practicality, that's all.
A month. Which is quite a long time, all things considered.
They were mediocre. Went too easy on the cult and didn't make quotas. Bossman was not happy at all.
They went too hard on the cult and everyone revolted. Greatness is only great if you don't have the people wanting you dead.
The name's Clippy, by the way. I'm your assistant. My job is to help you be the best "Chosen One" you can be.
But my bigger job is to make sure this cult doesn't fall apart, got it? You do your job well, and we'll be good friends. Otherwise....
Let's just say that despite clashing with the Bossman, he still keeps me around for a reason.
Right hover text: You're kinda rude for an assistant.

Card Text: That's up to you.
I prefer the term "results-oriented" instead of "rude."
Now, here are the KPIs you need to monitor. If any of them hit "0" you're in for a world of trouble.
But while you're monitoring those KPI's, keep in mind what the Bossman wants or doesn't want.
Sometimes you need to listen to him and what he wants. Sometimes, you shouldn't. Use your common sense.
Speaking of common sense, here's a stack of Requests, Complaints, and Other Cult Things that needs your attention.
Remember to budget your KPIs properly. Good luck. I'll be here if you need any help.
You don't get a chance to say anything before Clippy sends you to your office with a stack of papers to sort through.
It's your first day as the Chosen One of this... cult? Surely, it can't be too difficult, can it?
